name: ATAM
description:
ATAM is a FRENCH visual novel created during a school project.

We are in L2 Video Games and this is our first project/game of the year. We had 2 weeks to make it. 

Our game programmer : Hugo Lestriez

Our game designer : Louis Gaubil

Our game artists : Safran Reynaert (3D) and Steffy Guidez (me) (2D).

Don't hesitate to give us advices to improve and to keep on the right way.
